name: Fardeen Pettiwala

current_company.name: Fractal
current_company.title: Data Scientist at Fractal | IIT Kharagpur

positions.subtitle: Fractal
positions.description: - Leveraging Large Language Models (LLMs) to innovate in code generation, achieving a 91.65 Pass@1 (GPT-4 Turbo) score on the HumanEval leaderboard by employing advanced techniques like Chain-of-Thought (CoT) reasoning, ReAct, multi-agent systems, self-correction, and reflection-based methods.- Optimized smaller, cost-effective models to match the performance of larger models using strategies such as self-consistency, tree and graph structures, temperature tuning, and seed variance analysis.- Extended expertise to Machine Learning (ML) tasks, focusing on building adaptive frameworks for solving real-world problems.- Designed iterative pipelines for Kaggle competitions, achieving gold-standard results and placing in the top 40% quantile for both tabular and vision tasks.- Developing a cutting-edge ML framework aimed at solving MLE benchmarks, supporting live Kaggle challenges, and addressing complex client projects with an emphasis on execution memory and reasoning for next-phase improvements.
positions.title: Data Scientist
positions.description_html:
- Leveraging Large Language Models (LLMs) to innovate in code generation, achieving a 91.65 Pass@1 (GPT-4 Turbo) score on the HumanEval leaderboard by employing advanced techniques like Chain-of-Thought (CoT) reasoning, ReAct, multi-agent systems, self-correction, and reflection-based methods.
- Optimized smaller, cost-effective models to match the performance of larger models using strategies such as self-consistency, tree and graph structures, temperature tuning, and seed variance analysis.
- Extended expertise to Machine Learning (ML) tasks, focusing on building adaptive frameworks for solving real-world problems.
- Designed iterative pipelines for Kaggle competitions, achieving gold-standard results and placing in the top 40% quantile for both tabular and vision tasks.
- Developing a cutting-edge ML framework aimed at solving MLE benchmarks, supporting live Kaggle challenges, and addressing complex client projects with an emphasis on execution memory and reasoning for next-phase improvements.

positions.subtitle: Fractal
positions.description: - Engineered Face Anti-spoofing CNN based Kafka streaming platform to classify live & spoof RGB images to prevent unauthorised employee access with 98% accuracy, refer blog authored â€Face Anti-spoofing (FAS) 101 using RGB Imagesâ€- Authored a Medium blog post titled â€Accelerating Deep Learning Inference for Machine Visionâ€ exploring ONNX and TensorRT frameworks enable efficient deployment compared to traditional Torch and Tensorflow methods for the edge.- Logged experimentation with lower precision models of ResNet50 and YOLOv5 like FP32, FP16 and INT8 in different frameworks monitoring the incremental results on inference time (FPS), model accuracy and footprint.- Packaged in-house model exporter pip install and docker image, to convert PyTorch models to ONNX and TensorRT.- Dockerised and deployed Machine Learning models to Fractal IVA platform serving FastAPI endpoints for inference.- Experimented with optimisations for Triton Server and clients to achieve coherent performance for model serving.
positions.title: Imagineer
positions.description_html:
- Engineered Face Anti-spoofing CNN based Kafka streaming platform to classify live & spoof RGB images to prevent unauthorised employee access with 98% accuracy, refer blog authored â€Face Anti-spoofing (FAS) 101 using RGB Imagesâ€
- Authored a Medium blog post titled â€Accelerating Deep Learning Inference for Machine Visionâ€ exploring ONNX and TensorRT frameworks enable efficient deployment compared to traditional Torch and Tensorflow methods for the edge.
- Logged experimentation with lower precision models of ResNet50 and YOLOv5 like FP32, FP16 and INT8 in different frameworks monitoring the incremental results on inference time (FPS), model accuracy and footprint.
- Packaged in-house model exporter pip install and docker image, to convert PyTorch models to ONNX and TensorRT.
- Dockerised and deployed Machine Learning models to Fractal IVA platform serving FastAPI endpoints for inference.
- Experimented with optimisations for Triton Server and clients to achieve coherent performance for model serving.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: â€¢ Worked in a team to develop a GUI based application in Python for auto-testing of USB module for Android where test results are stored in a file locally.â€¢ Innovatively implemented various Android Debug Bridge (ADB) commands to interact with an Android device by using USB debugging developer mode.â€¢ Our team established a secure serial port connection to the device via which ATention (AT) commands are sent and information retrieved at the terminal.
experience.description_html: â€¢ Worked in a team to develop a GUI based application in Python for auto-testing of USB module for Android where test results are stored in a file locally.â€¢ Innovatively implemented various Android Debug Bridge (ADB) commands to interact with an Android device by using USB debugging developer mode.â€¢ Our team established a secure serial port connection to the device via which ATention (AT) commands are sent and information retrieved at the terminal. <!---->

experience.title: General Secretary Students' Welfare
experience.description: â€¢ Responsible for the well-being and welfare of student community which included enhancing student happiness quotient (HQ) and overall student experience by acting as a SPOC (single point of contact) to various groups - Counselling Center, Student Welfare Group (SWG) and the RP Hall Council.â€¢ Managed a budget of INR 1,00,000 which included maintenance of the students' activity room, in addition conducted events like Aavhan, an annual social and cultural night, aimed not only to increase the bonding among the residents of the hall but also to exhibit their latent talents on stage.
experience.description_html: â€¢ Responsible for the well-being and welfare of student community which included enhancing student happiness quotient (HQ) and overall student experience by acting as a SPOC (single point of contact) to various groups - Counselling Center, Student Welfare Group (SWG) and the RP Hall Council.â€¢ Managed a budget of INR 1,00,000 which included maintenance of the students' activity room, in addition conducted events like Aavhan, an annual social and cultural night, aimed not only to increase the bonding among the residents of the hall but also to exhibit their latent talents on stage.

experience.title: Information Technology Intern
experience.description: â€¢ Identified major bottlenecks resulting in poor performance of their commercial website using Yslow and PageSpeed tools offered by GTmetrix.â€¢ Performed a comparative study of e-groceries by examining site performance, shopping experience and compiled essential improvements.â€¢ Optimized stored procedures by reducing redirects and extracting valid results improving the efficiency of SQL database queries called in operation.

experience.title: Secretary Indoor Games
experience.description: â€¢ Strategically planned and single-handedly managed 6 sporting events while ensuring the 100% regular practice, fitness of players, and equipment lifecycle management, thereby securing an overall third place in General Championship Sports 2019, within a meagre budget of INR 1,39,000.â€¢ Collaboratively organized the annual 3-day box-cricket tournament, Cric-Mania, witnessing an increase of 50% in participation with 300+ participants.

experience.title: Student Volunteer
experience.description: The National Service Scheme (NSS)  is a Central Sector Scheme of Government of India, Ministry of Youth Affairs & Sports. It provides opportunity to the student youth of Technical Institution, Graduate and Post-graduate at colleges and university level of India to take part in various government led community service activities & programmes. The sole aim of NSS is to provide hands on experience to young students in delivering community service.
experience.description_html: The National Service Scheme (NSS) is a Central Sector Scheme of Government of India, Ministry of Youth Affairs & Sports. It provides opportunity to the student youth of Technical Institution, Graduate and Post-graduate at colleges and university level of India to take part in various government led community service activities & programmes. The sole aim of NSS is to provide hands on experience to young students in delivering community service. <!---->

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: Worked in Prof. Soumyo Mukherji's lab of Biosensors and Bioinstrumentation under a research scholar to make micro-lenses using PDMS (polydimethylsiloxane) using nature interface between immiscible liquids.

projects: [{"title":"Lexical Complexity Prediction (LCP), IIT Kharagpur - Dr. Pawan Goyal","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Apr 2021","description":"- Modelled Attention-based Bi-LSTM approach for token features and sentence context to produce final embedding.- Team model with feature select achieved first on leaderboard with Pearson correlation of 0.832 among 30 groups"},{"title":"Battery Management System (BMS), IIT Kharagpur - Dr. Siddhartha Mukhopadyay","start_date":"Aug 2020","end_date":"Dec 2020","description":"- Debugging BMS statecharts in Simulink to incorporate algorithms of state-of-charge (SOC) and state-of-health (SOH) and abuse detection.- Extracting C code for developed flow using an Embedded coder to deploy on demo-test bed in various environments."},{"title":"Holistic Regularisation Variational Autoencoder, IIT Kharagpur - Dr. Pawan Goyal","start_date":"Jan 2020","end_date":"Apr 2020","description":"- Implemented - A Stable Variational Autoencoder for Text Modelling, to find the similarity among 500 question pairs.- Achieved accuracy 0.67, specificity 0.592, and AUC score 0.722 using model with base tf-idf and doc2vec models."}]
